about_the_game:
Eden - Welcome Home!



Eden is the garden, the place from which creativity grows. Explore worlds, meet other people, build and garden on your home Island or head to a temple or chill world. The options are endless.

Eden is a world full of adventure, exploration, creation, and play. Come join us as we create the world together.

Eden is cross platform but designed with VR as a priority. The potentials for creative freedom and flow inducing gaming are exponentially increased in this emerging platform. Enjoy all the native social features and fully integrated voice chat, you can explore and hang out with your friends regardless of what device or platform they are playing on.

Customize your Avatar and home world. Explore artworks and soundscapes created by the visionary masters of our lifetime. Watch your garden grow and explore your friends garden as well. Build dreamlike environments that invite creatures and people from all walks of life.
